official_title: A bill to establish in the State of Texas the Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
short_title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Site Act of 1991

summary.text: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Site Act of 1991 - Establishes the Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Site, Texas, to preserve the site of the first battle of the Mexican-American War. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to develop and transmit to specified congressional committees a general management plan for such site. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Site Act of 1991
A bill to establish in the State of Texas the Palo Alto Battlefield National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
